actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to require 15 days notification to the Governor of any State prior to transporting nuclear waste to, through, or across the State.

summary.text: Directs the Nuclear Regulatory Commission to promulgate regulations requiring 15 days notification to the Governor of any State prior to the transportation of nuclear waste to, through, or across such State.

titles.title: A bill to require 15 days notification to the Governor of any State prior to transporting nuclear waste to, through, or across the State.
